title: v1.3.0 Beta Testing
message: Join the Termix Discord using the button below to take part in the v1.3.0 beta test! Once inside, head over to the #beta-testing channel for full details. This update introduces a complete UI redesign based on your survey feedback, and testing will run for about 1â€“3 days depending on how quickly feedback comes in. After testing, v1.3.0 will become the new standard release. Thank you!
